      The method returns a bean containing the information about the violations of the given user into the given environment.
      static RiskInfoFull checkUserFull(DAO sql, java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2AddBean, java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2RemBean, <any> rightsList, EnvironmentBean environmentBean, UserBean userBean)
      The method returns a bean containing two RiskInfo that show the information about actual and possible violations of the given user into the given environment after the addition and/or removal of the given lists of entitlements.

    • Method Detail

      • checkUser

        public static RiskInfo checkUser(DAO sql,
                                 java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2AddBean,
                                 java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2RemBean,
                                 <any> rightsList,
                                 EnvironmentBean environmentBean,
                                 UserBean userBean)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a bean containing the information about the violations of the given user into the given environment. The method also allows to check the violations of the user after the possible addition and/or removal of the given lists of entitlements.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connnection parameter
        blEntitlement2AddBean - list of entitlements to add to the user
        blEntitlement2RemBean - list of entitlements to remove from the user
        environmentBean - environment filter, if used it must be defined uniquely, if NULL it is used the default environment
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        risk information bean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkUserFull

        public static RiskInfoFull checkUserFull(DAO sql,
                                         java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2AddBean,
                                         java.util.List<EntitlementBean> blEntitlement2RemBean,
                                         <any> rightsList,
                                         EnvironmentBean environmentBean,
                                         UserBean userBean)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a bean containing two RiskInfo that show the information about actual and possible violations of the given user into the given environment after the addition and/or removal of the given lists of entitlements.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connnection parameter
        blEntitlement2AddBean - list of entitlements to add to the user
        blEntitlement2RemBean - list of entitlements to remove from the user
        environmentBean - environment filter, if used it must be defined uniquely, if NULL it is used the default environment
        userBean - user filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        full risk information bean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkOU

        public static RiskInfo checkOU(DAO sql,
                               <any> blEntitlementBean,
                               EnvironmentBean environmentBean,
                               OrgUnitBean orgUnitBean)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        The method returns a bean containing the information about the violations of the given organization unit into the given environment after the possible addition of the given list of entitlements.
        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connnection parameter
        blEntitlementBean - list of entitlements to add to the organization unit
        environmentBean - environment filter, if used it must be defined uniquely, if NULL it is used the default environment
        orgUnitBean - organization unit filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        risk information bean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                        <any> blEntitlementBean,

        Parameters:
        sql - mandatory connnection parameter
        blEntitlementBean - list of entitlements to add to the user
        environmentBean - environment filter, if used it must be defined uniquely, if NULL it is used the default environment
        entitlementBean - entitlement filter, mandatory and defined uniquely
        Returns:
        risk information bean
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        environmentBean - environment filter, if used it must be defined uniquely, if NULL it is used the default environment
